10:00 p.m. Group leaders deliver one-page summarize at ions of their sessions
to Henry Mamet.* (Room 1A)
Region III Conference Program Committee meets to plan agenda
for Tuesday morning session. (Room 1C)
Tuesday, March 19
9:00 a.m. Concluding Session - "The Membership Speaks. M (Room 2BC)
(Open to NAEB members only)
Discussion leader: Alec Sutherland, Director, Center for
Continuing Education; Director, Educational Broadcasting, The
University of Chicago.
Report by Region III Board Member: Richard B. Hull, Director,
Radio and Television Broadcasting, The Ohio State University.
Open Discussion - planned to allow every NAEB Member to
"sound off. M
12 noon Adjournment of Convention
(NOTE: Official adjournment of the convention is not intended to
act as a deterrant to discussion; those so wishing may lunch
together and return to the conference room.)
1:30 p.m. Tour of WTTW/Channel 11 (Those desiring this tour should sign
up for it at registration.)
^Summaries of each of the 16 group discussions will be edited and mailed to
all conferees.
